question_text: I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.
description: Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.
values: Allowed values: yes (stored as 'yes'; original raw label: 'Yes')

question_text: Which of the following best describes your current work status?
description: Participant employment status.
values: Allowed values: student, employed_full_time, employed_part_time, self_employed, not_currently_working, other

question_text: Do you use any AI-powered tools or features in your work or daily life? (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search)
description: Whether participant uses AI tools.
values: Allowed values: yes, no

question_text: How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?
description: Frequency of AI tool or digital tool use.
values: Allowed values (stored as snake_case): never, rarely, sometimes, occasionally, often, very_often, everyday

question_text: Using AI tools influences my emotional state.
description: Extent to which AI use affects emotional state.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I sometimes feel emotionally flat or neutral after using AI-powered tools.
description: Emotional flatness after AI use.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I feel more emotionally drained after long or repeated use of AI tools.
description: Emotional fatigue caused by AI usage.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: AI tools sometimes give me a sense of relief or support when I feel overloaded.
description: AI as a source of relief or emotional support.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: My mood can shift quickly during or after using AI tools and chats.
description: Mood variability associated with AI use.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: Using AI-powered tools influences how I see myself and my abilities.
description: Impact of AI use on identity and self-view.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I sometimes question what is genuinely 'mine' versus shaped by suggestions from AI tools.
description: Concerns about AI shaping personal thoughts.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: AI tools affect how authentic my work or ideas feel.
description: Authenticity concerns regarding AI-influenced work.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I sometimes feel less connected to my real self when I rely heavily on AI tools.
description: Feeling less connected to self when using AI.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I worry that regular use of AI systems may blur or weaken parts of my identity.
description: Identity erosion concerns tied to AI use.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: How have AI tools influenced your emotions or inner experience?
description: Open-text emotional effects of AI.
values: Open-text responses describing how AI use has affected participants’ emotions. Minimal cleaning applied (whitespace trimming newline removal). Raw wording preserved exactly. Empty string indicates no response.

question_text: How have AI tools influenced your creativity or originality?
description: Open-text creativity effects of AI.
values: Open-text responses describing how AI use has affected participants’ sense of creativity. Minimal cleaning applied (whitespace trimming, newline removal). Raw wording preserved exactly. Empty string indicates no response.

question_text: What is your age group?
description: Age category.

question_text: Country of residence.
description: Country participant lives in.
values: Allowed values (ISO-like codes): au, ca, ie, nz, uk, us

question_text: Which of the following best describes your gender?
description: Participant gender identity.
values: Allowed values: man, woman, non_binary, prefer_not_to_say
